name: Legend of Lusca
description:
Explore this amazing sub-sea world and get close to wonderful creatures that inhabit the beautiful clear waters. But, remember, where there is deep water, there is always a legend not too far away.

Explore this amazing sub-sea world and get close to wonderful creatures that inhabit the beautiful clear waters. But, remember, where there is deep water, there is always a legend not too far away.

This experience features full 360 video shot in high resolution in the Bahamas, in 3D. The addition of the real-time content provides another level of immersion in 6 DOF headsets.

You are almost there in person. Watch out for the sharks!

Game Play: Sit back and explore full 360 VR video.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
